displayName.text: New York State Department of Corrections and Community Supervision

formattedAddress: 314 W 40th St, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 314 W 40th St, New York, NY 10018-1404, USA

originalText.text: The Parole Officers here do an amazing job helping parolees live law abiding lives. The men and women employed here are professional and caring and works hard to help parolees make positive  changes in their lives.

text.text: The Parole Officers here do an amazing job helping parolees live law abiding lives. The men and women employed here are professional and caring and works hard to help parolees make positive  changes in their lives.

originalText.text: The NYS Dept of Corrections has a corrupt relationship with phone service provider Global Tel*Link (GTL). GTL is one of the worse phone service providers in the U.S. with a 97% negative rating  and 551+ complaints on the Better Business Bureau's website! Their rates are exorbitant and New York State families can't speak to imprisoned loved ones due to cost. Family ties are more important than enriching corrupt officials in the NYS Dept of Corrections, shame on you derelict public officials. Do your jobs and allow an open and competitive bidding process for the company providing phone services. New York State families deserve better.

originalText.text: I called three times in a row to find about a friend and they hung up the phone in the middle of our conversation. Why do we pay tax dollars to rude individual who are suppose to protect us?

text.text: I called three times in a row to find about a friend and they hung up the phone in the middle of our conversation. Why do we pay tax dollars to rude individual who are suppose to protect us?

originalText.text: I called a few times to find out about my husbands' case and they were so rude to me. They couldn't answer none of my questions and they didn't show no interest to help me out. Don't waste your time here smh.
